resources.string: ThirtyDays
Learn about the basics of Android development.
You will be going through the android documentation on developer.android.com and take several paths.
Set up your development environment.
You will be setting up your development environment by installing Android Studio.
Create a simple app with a button and a text view.
You will be creating a simple app with a button and a text view.
Learn about the activity lifecycle.
You will be learning about the activity lifecycle.
Create an app with multiple activities.
You will be creating an app with multiple activities.
Learn about the Android Manifest file.
You will be learning about the Android Manifest file.
Create an app with a scrollable list of items.
You will be creating an app with a scrollable list of items.
Learn about the Android Gradle build system.
You will be learning about the Android Gradle build system.
Create an app with a navigation drawer.
You will be creating an app with a navigation drawer.
Learn about the Android Support Library.
You will be learning about the Android Support Library.
Create an app with a floating action button.
You will be creating an app with a floating action button.
Learn about the Android Toolbar.
You will be learning about the Android Toolbar.
Create an app with a custom toolbar.
You will be creating an app with a custom toolbar.
Learn about the Android Styles and Themes.
You will be learning about the Android Styles and Themes.
Create an app with a custom theme.
You will be creating an app with a custom theme.
Learn about the Android Material Design guidelines.
You will be learning about the Android Material Design guidelines.
Create an app with Material Design components.
You will be creating an app with Material Design components.
Learn about the Android RecyclerView.
You will be learning about the Android RecyclerView.
Create an app with a RecyclerView.
You will be creating an app with a RecyclerView.
Learn about the Android CardView.
You will be learning about the Android CardView.
Create an app with a CardView.
You will be creating an app with a CardView.
Learn about the Android ConstraintLayout.
You will be learning about the Android ConstraintLayout.
Create an app with a ConstraintLayout.
You will be creating an app with a ConstraintLayout.
Learn about the Android Firebase Realtime Database.
You will be learning about the Android Firebase Realtime Database.
Create an app with Firebase Realtime Database integration.
You will be creating an app with Firebase Realtime Database integration.
Learn about the Android Firebase Authentication.
You will be learning about the Android Firebase Authentication.
Create an app with Firebase Authentication integration.
You will be creating an app with Firebase Authentication integration.
Learn about the Android Firebase Cloud Messaging.
You will be learning about the Android Firebase Cloud Messaging.
Create an app with Firebase Cloud Messaging integration.
You will be creating an app with Firebase Cloud Messaging integration.
Learn about the Android Firebase Remote Config.
You will be learning about the Android Firebase Remote Config.
